SELECT ifnull(sum(V_TOTAL_COLLECTION),0) COUNT_MONEY, ifnull(sum(V_ALI_COLLECTION),0) ALI_MONEY, ifnull(sum(V_WX_COLLECTION),0) WX_MONEY FROM T_COLLECTION_TAB
and V_APP_ID = #{V_APP_ID}

SELECT ifnull(sum(V_TOTAL_MONEY),0) COUNT_MONEY, ifnull(sum(V_ALI_MONEY),0) ALI_MONEY, ifnull(sum(V_WX_MONEY),0) WX_MONEY FROM t_pay_account tpa left join t_account_collection tac on tac.V_ACCOUNT_ID = tpa.ID
and tpa.V_CREATE_USER = #{V_USER_ID}
